text: antima ghaḷigeya kuritāda jñānavu avana (allāhana) vaśadallē ide. Avanige arivillade yāva haṇṇū tanna goneyinda hora hom'malāradu, yāva heṇṇū garbha dharisalāraḷu mattu prasavisalāraḷu. ‘‘Elliddāre nanna pāludāraru?’’ Endu ā dina avanu avaroḍane kūgi kēḷuvanu. Avaru hēḷuvaru; ‘‘nāvu ninage tiḷisiruvevu, nam'mallobbarū adara samarthakaralla’’
